name: nf3or
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: nfxfr(s0, w3o(w0, w1, w2), wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w3o(w0, w1, w2))
-| wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w3o(w0, w1, w2))
-| wb(w3o(w0, w1, w2), wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))

|- wnf(s0, w3o(w0, w1, w2))
-| wnf(s0, wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wo(wo(w0, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w3o(w0, w1, w2))
-| wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wo(w0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w3o(w0, w1, w2))
-| wnf(s0, w2)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` , ` ps ` , and ` ch ` , then it is not free in ` ( ph \/ ps \/ ch ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
